location.description: The supported Azure location where the resource deployed

resource_group_name.description: The name of the resource group to deploy resources into

resource_prefix.description: A suffix string to centrally mitigate resource name collisions.

tags.description: A list of tags used for deployed services.

vnet_ingress_address_space.description: Virtual network address space for ingress

vnet_ingress_frontend_subnet.description: Subnet address space for ingress frontend (AppGw)

vnet_ingress_backend_subnet.description: Subnet address space for ingress backend (AKS nodepool)
